PrisonerInteractionModeDef.label: no interaction
PrisonerInteractionModeDef.description: Wardens will not interact with the prisoner.

PrisonerInteractionModeDef.label: recruit
PrisonerInteractionModeDef.description: Wardens will attempt to recruit the prisoner. If the prisoner still has resistance, wardens will speak to them to reduce it.

PrisonerInteractionModeDef.label: reduce resistance
PrisonerInteractionModeDef.description: If the prisoner still has resistance, wardens will speak to them to reduce it. No recruit attempts will be made.

PrisonerInteractionModeDef.label: release
PrisonerInteractionModeDef.description: A warden will release the prisoner.

PrisonerInteractionModeDef.label: execute
PrisonerInteractionModeDef.description: A warden will execute the prisoner on the spot by cutting. This can affect the mood of other prisoners and colonists.
